info.name: Contacts - CRUD
info.description:
# Description:

The Contacts resource stores and manages user contact information, including names, emails, phone numbers, and addresses. It supports full CRUD operations via these API endpoints:

- `POST /contacts` → Add new contact
    
- `GET /contacts` → Retrieve all contacts
    
- `GET /contacts/:id` → Get single contact
    
- `PUT /contacts/:id` → Fully replace contact
    
- `PATCH /contacts/:id` → Partially update contact
    
- `DELETE /contacts/:id` → Remove contact
